effect.minecraft.haste.4.desc: +10%% Attack Speed and +20%% Dig Speed per level.
effect.minecraft.mining_fatigue.4.desc: Decreases 10%% Attack Damage per level and increase Dig Speed by (3^lvl) times.
effect.minecraft.instant_health.4.desc: Regenerates 2*(2^lvl) HP per tick. Deals damage when on Undeads.
effect.minecraft.instant_damage.4.desc: Deducts 3*(2^lvl) HP per tick, cures when on Undeads.
effect.minecraft.jump_boost.4.desc: +1.25 Jump Height. Resists 1 fall damage per level.
effect.minecraft.resistance.2.desc: Blocks 20%% of any incoming damage per level aside from Void and Starving Damage.
effect.minecraft.resistance.4.desc: Immune to any incoming damage aside from Void and Starving Damage.
effect.minecraft.fire_resistance.0.desc: Fire Resistance. Increase visibility in Lava.
effect.minecraft.invisibility.0.desc: Hides entities' shapes, shrink the area where it can be detected. Armors lower the efficacy.
effect.minecraft.blindness.0.desc: Darkens FOV, lose visibility, no sprinting and critical damage dealing.
effect.minecraft.hunger.4.desc: Hungers 1 point per (40/lvl) second. Turns the Hunger Bar lime.
effect.minecraft.weakness.4.desc: Decreases 4 Melee Attack Damage per level.
effect.minecraft.poison.0.desc: Deducts 1 HP per 25 ticks. Turns the Health Bar lime. Non-lethal effect.
effect.minecraft.poison.1.desc: Intensify to deducting 1 HP per 12 ticks.
effect.minecraft.poison.2.desc: Intensify to deducting 1 HP per 6 ticks.
effect.minecraft.poison.3.desc: Intensify to deducting 1 HP per 3 ticks.
effect.minecraft.poison.4.desc: Intensify to deducting 1 HP per tick.
effect.minecraft.wither.0.desc: Deducts 1 HP per 40 ticks. Turns the Hunger Bar black.
effect.minecraft.wither.1.desc: Intensify to deducting 1 HP per 20 ticks.
effect.minecraft.wither.2.desc: Intensify to deducting 1 HP per 10 ticks.
effect.minecraft.wither.3.desc: Intensify to deducting 1 HP per 5 ticks.
effect.minecraft.wither.4.desc: Intensify to deducting 1 HP per 2 ticks.
effect.minecraft.saturation.4.desc: Regenerates (lvl) point(s) in Hunger Bar and (2*lvl) in Health Bar per tick.
effect.minecraft.glowing.0.desc: Highlights the entities. The glowing outlines could be seen through blockings.
effect.minecraft.levitation.4.desc: Floats up (0.9*lvl) blocks per second unconditionally.
effect.minecraft.conduit_power.4.desc: Water Breathing, full brightness vision day and night, also mines faster.
effect.minecraft.bad_omen.0.desc: Effect ends when entered a village, meanwhile trigger a Raid. The higher level it is, the more likely the illagers in the Raid would equip enchanted armors and weapons.
effect.minecraft.bad_omen.4.desc: Trigger one more wave of Raid.
effect.minecraft.hero_of_the_village.0.d: Every trades have a 30%% + 6.25%% * (lvl - 1) discount and villagers may offer gifts.
effect.warpedpots.warping.0.desc: Teleports you to where the effect started when it runs out. Doesn't work between dimensions.
effect.elenaidodge2.feathers.0.desc: Adds gold feathers during effect, use them or lose them
effect.elenaidodge2.forceful.0.desc: You go a little further when dashing
effect.lycanitesmobs.bleed.0.desc: You take damage only while moving
effect.sons_of_sins.very_bad_omen.0.desc: You should dash right when the effect ends
effect.sons_of_sins.greed.0.desc: Drags you into the ground to suffocate lul
effect.sonicraft.false_reality.0.desc: Makes you lift up into the air
effect.potions.darkoakp.0.desc: Places dark oak blocks under you
effect.potions.dispens.0.desc: Rapidly shoot arrows from the depths of your soul
effect.lycanitesmobs.instability.0.desc: Randomly pushes you in all directions
